thread.title: How a police officer helped save NBA’s Caron Butler PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: How a police officer helped save NBA’s Caron Butler | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: How a police officer helped save NBA’s Caron Butler PBS NewsHour
text: To see Caron Butler on the basketball court today, you'd have little sense of how far this NBA player has come. As a young boy, he had the dream and the skills, but nearly threw it away for a life of violence, drug dealing and prison. William Brangham talks with Butler and retired Sgt. Rick Geller -- the police officer who helped turn him around -- about Caron’s book, "Tuff Juice."
